thread.title: OMG! Porn on TV at Lisbon Airport leaves passengers shocked! (Watch video)
thread.title_full: OMG! Porn on TV at Lisbon Airport leaves passengers shocked! (Watch video)

author: Prathamesh Jadhav | India.com Entertainment Desk
title: OMG! Porn on TV at Lisbon Airport leaves passengers shocked! (Watch video)
text:
OMG! Porn on TV at Lisbon Airport leaves passengers shocked! (Watch video) By India.com Entertainment Desk on October 23, 2015 at 4:33 AM Comments 
Passengers at Lisbon Airport were in for a Big surprise when a screen at the airport started playing porn accidentally. The passengers felt embarrassed, awkward and even angry even if officials at the airport scurried to fix the apparent problem. Here’s a video that tells the whole story captured on camera. 
Lisbon airport accidentally plays porn out over the big TV screens for shocked passengers Airport customers were left in shock after graphic porn scenes starting playing out over big TV screens as they collected their luggage.The incident was caught on camera by one passenger in Lisbon Airport who whipped out his mobile phone to record the bizarre moment. 
Of course, it then didn’t take long before the clip was posted to YouTube and circulated around the internet. According to Portuguese media, the incident occurred on October 19 at Terminal 1 of the airport building as baffled passengers waited at the baggage carousel. It is thought the pornographic video broadcast lasted for several minutes. 
It is not clear whether the video was shown by pranksters who had hacked into the airport’s TV screens or whether staff on duty at the terminal were involved. Mirror.co.uk has contacted Lisbon Airport for comment. 
Last week, a mum shopping in a Target supermarket was left horrified after the store played graphic porn audio over the loudspeakers .
